compliant.legal provisions: The collection of personal data must be lawful and fair.
Data subjects should be informed about the collection of their data.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to access their personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Include a statement on how users can access their personal data.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to request deletion of their personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Add information on how users can request deletion of their data.
